comments.raw_text:
So we don't forget:
<ted>	also, file a bug on a configure check of $target vs $CC so we don't forget!

Context:  I was trying to build a 64-bit build on windows, and got a really weird error because I didn't pass --target=x86_64-pc-mingw32 to configure.  Ted says this should be easy to check for, and then we could give a saner error.
comments.author: sdwilsh@forerunnerdesigns.com
comments.creator: sdwilsh@forerunnerdesigns.com
